content=Bed and Breakfast Masseria Cesarina is immersed in amongst olive groves and fruit orchards in Castellana Grotte, 14 km from Alberobello. The farmhouse has been immaculately renovated and tastefully furnished retaining the character of the building. Some original floor tiles and lamps can be found amongst modern facilities of air conditioning, en-suite bathrooms, etc. 
Masseria Cesarina comprises of five en-suite bedrooms (former cheese room and living accommodation) with bidets and spacious shower cubicles. Has family rooms with king size beds and extra beds can be added on request. Two of the rooms are interconnecting, cots are available on request, linen and towels are included. The B & B is all on one level and it has wide doorways for wheelchair access and one bathroom for disabled visitors. A TV, DVD player, and a hairdryer are provided in each room
The open plan dining-room and kitchen (the former stables), is a public area with TV, (with BBC News) and DVD player. Tea and Coffee making facilities are available in the spacious and friendly communal kitchen. Breakfast is served either in the dining-room or al fresco in the courtyard, room service is available. Guests are welcome to cook meals in the kitchen rather than going out to restaurants.
The English speaking B&B offers welcoming accommodation where you can relax and unwind in a comfortable and private area while remaining close to amenities
